coreAttributes.name: chastity cage
coreAttributes.description: A basic penis-shaped cage, complete with lock, that's designed to imprison the wearer's cock. When worn, it will physically prevent an erection from occurring.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lock)] the chastity cage in place around [npc.her] cock.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lock)] the chastity cage in place around [npc2.namePos] cock.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly squeezes [npc2.namePos] cock before locking it inside the chastity cage.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(remove)] the chastity cage that was imprisoning [npc.her] cock.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(remove)] the chastity cage that was imprisoning [npc2.namePos] cock.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(pull)] off the chastity cage that was imprisoning [npc2.namePos] cock.
